title: Science Concept Comprehension Improvement Strategies Using Learner-Generated Drawing

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of middle school science fundamentals and foundational pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: Emphasizing personalized learning spaces with digital devices, analysis, and visualization of science curriculum content

learning_goals: Learners can visually structure relationships between concepts by illustrating scientific text content
Even in low-prior-knowledge contexts, learners can accurately extract 80% or more of core elements from scientific content using drawing strategies
When using drawing strategies compared to repeated reading, learners can improve comprehension scores by 15% or more relative to reading time
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
